content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (40.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), and (43.5, -80.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), and (-9.0, -48.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-15.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -46.5), and (-14.5, -45.5)

### Central Storage Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chest at position (45.5, -80.5)

### Additional Inserter Setup
- Burner Inserters at positions (41.5, -78.5) and (41.5, -77.5) connected to the Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities due to inventory shortages
- Ensure you have the required entity in your inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Check the target tile for existing entities before attempting to place a new entity. Remove any existing entities if necessary.

### Errors when placing inserters with incorrect spacing or direction
- Consider adjusting the spacing or direction when placing inserters to avoid collisions with existing entities. Ensure the reference position is clear of obstructions.

### Errors when trying to connect belts directly to chests
- Use inserters to transfer items to and from chests instead of attempting to connect belts directly.

### Errors due to collision with nearby entities
- Verify that the target position for placing entities is free from collisions with nearby entities. Adjust the position or direction as needed to avoid conflicts.
